title: Top 10 Most Engaged NA TFT Players Before Ranked

replies.body: what does most engaged mean? they played the most games? they ranked up the highest? they spent the most time in-game tft?
This was before ranked, so other than the rank one: yes. We factored in a few different things when we made this list, but number of games played was for sure one of them. :D
I'm disappointed I thought this was an article telling me what streamers to watch out for if you want to watch popular top level players.
Gonna assume my name had something to do with why Iâ€™m not on this list ðŸ¤”
I dunno, man. Turn 1 Delver is pretty triggering too.

Why did y'all roll out ranked so early in the first place? There are still many balance issues. I would have liked it if you took more time to make sure everything was adjusted correctly instead of rolling out so many changes at once and praying for the best.
Hopefully to milk it hard for the few month(s) until the season ends and it gets shut down.
Just an FYI. It says "We're celebrating the to 10 NA TFT superfans!" on the news page of the site.
Does everyone who played this gets the egg bundle?

these names look stupid and made up... i swear Toast was more active than anyone of these and more engaged with it since he actually taught people parts of the game... i havent seen a single video or cheat sheet made by anyone of these people.
just look like a bunch of letters to me. no idea who u r but good on u i guess
